title: Nadal beats 'aggressive' Bolelli to advance in French Open
text:
Nadal beats 'aggressive' Bolelli to advance in French Open 11:25am BST - 01:30
Rafael Nadal says that he 'respects the sport and every opponent' to avoid complacency as he starts his bid for an eleventh French Open title ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
